full_title: Murder on the Dancefloor by Sophie Ellis-Bextor
title: Murder on the Dancefloor

description.plain:
“Murder On the Dance Floor” is the second single from Sophie Ellis-Bextor’s debut album, Read My Lips.

The song peaked at #2 on the U.K. Singles chart and was certified Silver by the BPI. It became the most-played song in Europe in 2002. In the United States, it managed to peak at #26 on Billboard’s Hot Dance Music\Club Play Songs chart. During the tracking week ending January 13, 2024, the song, debuted at #98 on the Billboard Hot 100. The song marked her first appearance on the Hot 100. During the tracking week ending February 3, 2024, the song reached a new peak of #51.

Twenty-two years after it’s original release, the song regained traction after being featured in the concluding scene of the 2023 film Saltburn, featuring star actor Barry Keoghan.

embed_content: Read “Murder on the Dancefloor” by Sophie Ellis-Bextor on Genius

body.plain:
“Murder On the Dance Floor” is the second single from Sophie Ellis-Bextor’s debut album, Read My Lips.

The song peaked at #2 on the U.K. Singles chart and was certified Silver by the BPI. It became the most-played song in Europe in 2002. In the United States, it managed to peak at #26 on Billboard’s Hot Dance Music\Club Play Songs chart. During the tracking week ending January 13, 2024, the song, debuted at #98 on the Billboard Hot 100. The song marked her first appearance on the Hot 100. During the tracking week ending February 3, 2024, the song reached a new peak of #51.

Twenty-two years after it’s original release, the song regained traction after being featured in the concluding scene of the 2023 film Saltburn, featuring star actor Barry Keoghan.
